directions: Mix sour cream, onion, capers, chopped parsley and pepper in medium bowl. Season to taste with salt. (Sauce can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Place salmon on platter. Arrange bread slices around salmon. Garnish with parsley sprigs and serve with sauce.
ingredients: 1 whole side of pre-sliced smoked salmon (about 2 pounds)
2 16-ounce loaves cocktail rye and/or pumpernickel bread
title: Smoked Salmon with Sour Cream-Caper Sauce
